member.name: T:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertiser
member.summary: An AdvertiserResource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertiser.Category
member.summary: Category that this advertiser belongs to. A valid list of categories can be found here: http://www.google.com/support/affiliatenetwork/advertiser/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer=107581

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertiser.CommissionDuration
member.summary: The longest possible length of a commission (how long the cookies on the customer's browser last before they expire).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertiser.ContactEmail
member.summary: Email that this advertiser would like publishers to contact them with.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertiser.ContactPhone
member.summary: Phone that this advertiser would like publishers to contact them with.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertiser.Description
member.summary: Description of the website the advertiser advertises from.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertiser.EpcNinetyDayAverage
member.summary: An ApiMoneyProto.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertiser.EpcSevenDayAverage
member.summary: An ApiMoneyProto.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertiser.Id
member.summary: The ID of this advertiser.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertiser.Item
member.summary: An AdvertiserResource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertiser.JoinDate
member.summary: Date that this advertiser was approved as a Google Affiliate Network advertiser.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertiser.Kind
member.summary: The kind for an advertiser.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertiser.LogoUrl
member.summary: URL to the logo this advertiser uses on the Google Affiliate Network.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertiser.Name
member.summary: The name of this advertiser.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertiser.PayoutRank
member.summary: A rank based on commissions paid to publishers over the past 90 days. A number between 1 and 4 where 4 means the top quartile (most money paid) and 1 means the bottom quartile (least money paid).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertiser.ProductFeedsEnabled
member.summary: Allows advertisers to submit product listings to Google Product Search.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertiser.SiteUrl
member.summary: URL of the website this advertiser advertises from.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertiser.Status
member.summary: The status of the requesting publisher's relationship this advertiser.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertisers.Items
member.summary: The advertiser list.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertisers.Kind
member.summary: The kind for a page of advertisers.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Advertisers.NextPageToken
member.summary: The 'pageToken' to pass to the next request to get the next page, if there are more to retrieve.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer
member.summary: A credit card offer. There are many possible result fields. We provide two different views of the data, or "projections." The "full" projection includes every result field. And the "summary" projection, which is the default, includes a smaller subset of the fields. The fields included in the summary projection are marked as such in their descriptions.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.AdditionalCardBenefits
member.summary: More marketing copy about the card's benefits. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.AdditionalCardHolderFee
member.summary: Any extra fees levied on card holders.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.AgeMinimum
member.summary: The youngest a recipient of this card may be.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.AgeMinimumDetails
member.summary: Text describing the details of the age minimum restriction.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.AnnualFee
member.summary: The ongoing annual fee, in dollars.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.AnnualFeeDisplay
member.summary: Text describing the annual fee, including any difference for the first year. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.AnnualRewardMaximum
member.summary: The largest number of units you may accumulate in a year.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.ApprovedCategories
member.summary: Possible categories for this card, eg "Low Interest" or "Good." A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.AprDisplay
member.summary: Text describing the purchase APR. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.BalanceComputationMethod
member.summary: Text describing how the balance is computed. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.BalanceTransferTerms
member.summary: Text describing the terms for balance transfers. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.BonusRewards
member.summary: For cards with rewards programs, extra circumstances whereby additional rewards may be granted.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.CarRentalInsurance
member.summary: If you get coverage when you use the card for the given activity, this field describes it.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.CardBenefits
member.summary: A list of what the issuer thinks are the most important benefits of the card. Usually summarizes the rewards program, if there is one. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.CardName
member.summary: The issuer's name for the card, including any trademark or service mark designators. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.CardType
member.summary: What kind of credit card this is, for example secured or unsecured.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.CashAdvanceTerms
member.summary: Text describing the terms for cash advances. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.CreditLimitMax
member.summary: The high end for credit limits the issuer imposes on recipients of this card.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.CreditLimitMin
member.summary: The low end for credit limits the issuer imposes on recipients of this card.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.CreditRatingDisplay
member.summary: Text describing the credit ratings required for recipients of this card, for example "Excellent/Good." A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.DefaultFees
member.summary: Fees for defaulting on your payments.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.Disclaimer
member.summary: A notice that, if present, is referenced via an asterisk by many of the other summary fields. If this field is present, it will always start with an asterisk ("*"), and must be prominently displayed with the offer. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.EmergencyInsurance
member.summary: If you get coverage when you use the card for the given activity, this field describes it.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.ExistingCustomerOnly
member.summary: Whether this card is only available to existing customers of the issuer.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.ExtendedWarranty
member.summary: If you get coverage when you use the card for the given activity, this field describes it.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.FirstYearAnnualFee
member.summary: The annual fee for the first year, if different from the ongoing fee. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.FlightAccidentInsurance
member.summary: If you get coverage when you use the card for the given activity, this field describes it.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.ForeignCurrencyTransactionFee
member.summary: Fee for each transaction involving a foreign currency.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.FraudLiability
member.summary: If you get coverage when you use the card for the given activity, this field describes it.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.GracePeriodDisplay
member.summary: Text describing the grace period before finance charges apply. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.ImageUrl
member.summary: The link to the image of the card that is shown on Connect Commerce. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.InitialSetupAndProcessingFee
member.summary: Fee for setting up the card.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.IntroBalanceTransferTerms
member.summary: Text describing the terms for introductory period balance transfers. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.IntroCashAdvanceTerms
member.summary: Text describing the terms for introductory period cash advances. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.IntroPurchaseTerms
member.summary: Text describing the terms for introductory period purchases. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.Issuer
member.summary: Name of card issuer. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.IssuerId
member.summary: The Google Affiliate Network ID of the advertiser making this offer.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.IssuerWebsite
member.summary: The generic link to the issuer's site.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.Kind
member.summary: The kind for one credit card offer. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.LandingPageUrl
member.summary: The link to the issuer's page for this card. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.LatePaymentFee
member.summary: Text describing how much a late payment will cost, eg "up to $35." A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.LuggageInsurance
member.summary: If you get coverage when you use the card for the given activity, this field describes it.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.MaxPurchaseRate
member.summary: The highest interest rate the issuer charges on this card. Expressed as an absolute number, not as a percentage.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.MinPurchaseRate
member.summary: The lowest interest rate the issuer charges on this card. Expressed as an absolute number, not as a percentage.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.MinimumFinanceCharge
member.summary: Text describing how much missing the grace period will cost.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.Network
member.summary: Which network (eg Visa) the card belongs to. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.OfferId
member.summary: This offer's ID. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.OffersImmediateCashReward
member.summary: Whether a cash reward program lets you get cash back sooner than end of year or other longish period.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.OverLimitFee
member.summary: Fee for exceeding the card's charge limit.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.ProhibitedCategories
member.summary: Categories in which the issuer does not wish the card to be displayed. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.PurchaseRateAdditionalDetails
member.summary: Text describing any additional details for the purchase rate. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.PurchaseRateType
member.summary: Fixed or variable.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.ReturnedPaymentFee
member.summary: Text describing the fee for a payment that doesn't clear. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.RewardPartner
member.summary: The company that redeems the rewards, if different from the issuer.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.RewardUnit
member.summary: For cards with rewards programs, the unit of reward. For example, miles, cash back, points.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.Rewards
member.summary: For cards with rewards programs, detailed rules about how the program works.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.RewardsExpire
member.summary: Whether accumulated rewards ever expire.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.RewardsHaveBlackoutDates
member.summary: For airline miles rewards, tells whether blackout dates apply to the miles.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.StatementCopyFee
member.summary: Fee for requesting a copy of your statement.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.TrackingUrl
member.summary: The link to ping to register a click on this offer. A summary field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.TravelInsurance
member.summary: If you get coverage when you use the card for the given activity, this field describes it.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.VariableRatesLastUpdated
member.summary: When variable rates were last updated.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.VariableRatesUpdateFrequency
member.summary: How often variable rates are updated.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.BonusRewardsData.Amount
member.summary: How many units of reward will be granted.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.BonusRewardsData.Details
member.summary: The circumstances under which this rule applies, for example, booking a flight via Orbitz.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.DefaultFeesData.Category
member.summary: The type of charge, for example Purchases.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.DefaultFeesData.MaxRate
member.summary: The highest rate the issuer may charge for defaulting on debt in this category. Expressed as an absolute number, not as a percentage.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.DefaultFeesData.MinRate
member.summary: The lowest rate the issuer may charge for defaulting on debt in this category. Expressed as an absolute number, not as a percentage.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.DefaultFeesData.RateType
member.summary: Fixed or variable.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.RewardsData.AdditionalDetails
member.summary: Other limits, for example, if this rule only applies during an introductory period.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.RewardsData.Amount
member.summary: The number of units rewarded per purchase dollar.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.RewardsData.Category
member.summary: The kind of purchases covered by this rule.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.RewardsData.ExpirationMonths
member.summary: How long rewards granted by this rule last.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.RewardsData.MaxRewardTier
member.summary: The maximum purchase amount in the given category for this rule to apply.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffer.RewardsData.MinRewardTier
member.summary: The minimum purchase amount in the given category before this rule applies.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffers.Items
member.summary: The credit card offers.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.CcOffers.Kind
member.summary: The kind for a page of credit card offers.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event
member.summary: An EventResource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.AdvertiserId
member.summary: The ID of advertiser for this event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.AdvertiserName
member.summary: The name of the advertiser for this event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.ChargeId
member.summary: The charge ID for this event. Only returned for charge events.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.ChargeType
member.summary: Charge type of the event (other|slotting_fee|monthly_minimum|tier_bonus|debit|credit). Only returned for charge events.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.CommissionableSales
member.summary: An ApiMoneyProto.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.Earnings
member.summary: An ApiMoneyProto.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.EventDate
member.summary: The date-time this event was initiated as a RFC 3339 date-time value.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.Kind
member.summary: The kind for one event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.MemberId
member.summary: The ID of the member attached to this event. Only returned for conversion events.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.ModifyDate
member.summary: The date-time this event was last modified as a RFC 3339 date-time value.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.NetworkFee
member.summary: An ApiMoneyProto.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.OrderId
member.summary: The order ID for this event. Only returned for conversion events.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.Products
member.summary: Products associated with the event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.PublisherFee
member.summary: An ApiMoneyProto.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.PublisherId
member.summary: The ID of the publisher for this event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.PublisherName
member.summary: The name of the publisher for this event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.Status
member.summary: Status of the event (active|canceled). Only returned for charge and conversion events.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.Type
member.summary: Type of the event (action|transaction|charge).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.ProductsData.CategoryId
member.summary: Id of the category this product belongs to.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.ProductsData.CategoryName
member.summary: Name of the category this product belongs to.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.ProductsData.Earnings
member.summary: An ApiMoneyProto.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.ProductsData.NetworkFee
member.summary: An ApiMoneyProto.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.ProductsData.PublisherFee
member.summary: An ApiMoneyProto.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.ProductsData.Quantity
member.summary: Quantity of this product bought/exchanged.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.ProductsData.Sku
member.summary: Sku of this product.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.ProductsData.SkuName
member.summary: Sku name of this product.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Event.ProductsData.UnitPrice
member.summary: An ApiMoneyProto.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Events.Items
member.summary: The event list.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Events.Kind
member.summary: The kind for a page of events.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Events.NextPageToken
member.summary: The 'pageToken' to pass to the next request to get the next page, if there are more to retrieve.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Money
member.summary: An ApiMoneyProto.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Money.Amount
member.summary: The amount of money.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Money.CurrencyCode
member.summary: The 3-letter code of the currency in question.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Publisher
member.summary: A PublisherResource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Publisher.Classification
member.summary: Classification that this publisher belongs to. See this link for all publisher classifications: http://www.google.com/support/affiliatenetwork/advertiser/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer=107625&ctx=cb&src=cb&cbid=-k5fihzthfaik&cbrank=4

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Publisher.EpcNinetyDayAverage
member.summary: An ApiMoneyProto.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Publisher.EpcSevenDayAverage
member.summary: An ApiMoneyProto.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Publisher.Id
member.summary: The ID of this publisher.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Publisher.Item
member.summary: A PublisherResource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Publisher.JoinDate
member.summary: Date that this publisher was approved as a Google Affiliate Network publisher.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Publisher.Kind
member.summary: The kind for a publisher.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Publisher.Name
member.summary: The name of this publisher.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Publisher.PayoutRank
member.summary: A rank based on commissions paid to this publisher over the past 90 days. A number between 1 and 4 where 4 means the top quartile (most money paid) and 1 means the bottom quartile (least money paid).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Publisher.Sites
member.summary: Websites that this publisher uses to advertise.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Publisher.Status
member.summary: The status of the requesting advertiser's relationship with this publisher.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Publishers.Items
member.summary: The entity list.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Publishers.Kind
member.summary: The kind for a page of entities.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.Data.Publishers.NextPageToken
member.summary: The 'pageToken' to pass to the next request to get the next page, if there are more to retrieve.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.GanService.Key
member.summary: Sets the API-Key (or DeveloperKey) which this service uses for all requests

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.Get(Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.Role,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves data about a single advertiser if that the requesting advertiser/publisher has access to it. Only publishers can lookup advertisers. Advertisers can request information about themselves by omitting the advertiserId query parameter.
member.param: Required - Must be one of the following values [advertisers, publishers] - The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.
Required - The ID of the requesting advertiser or publisher.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.List(Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.Role,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves data about all advertisers that the requesting advertiser/publisher has access to.
member.param: Required - Must be one of the following values [advertisers, publishers] - The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.
Required - The ID of the requesting advertiser or publisher.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.Role
member.summary: The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.Role.Advertisers
member.summary: The requester is requesting as an advertiser.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.Role.Publishers
member.summary: The requester is requesting as a publisher.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.RelationshipStatus
member.summary: Filters out all advertisers for which do not have the given relationship status with the requesting publisher.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.RelationshipStatus.Approved
member.summary: An advertiser that has approved your application.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.RelationshipStatus.Available
member.summary: An advertiser program that's accepting new publishers.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.RelationshipStatus.Deactivated
member.summary: Deactivated means either the advertiser has removed you from their program, or it could also mean that you chose to remove yourself from the advertiser's program.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.RelationshipStatus.Declined
member.summary: An advertiser that did not approve your application.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.RelationshipStatus.Pending
member.summary: An advertiser program that you've already applied to, but they haven't yet decided to approve or decline your application.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.ListRequest.MaxResults
member.summary: Max number of items to return in this page. Optional. Defaults to 20.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.ListRequest.MinNinetyDayEpc
member.summary: Filters out all advertisers that have a ninety day EPC average lower than the given value (inclusive). Min value: 0.0. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.ListRequest.MinPayoutRank
member.summary: A value between 1 and 4, where 1 represents the quartile of advertisers with the lowest ranks and 4 represents the quartile of advertisers with the highest ranks. Filters out all advertisers with a lower rank than the given quartile. For example if a 2 was given only advertisers with a payout rank of 25 or higher would be included. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.ListRequest.MinSevenDayEpc
member.summary: Filters out all advertisers that have a seven day EPC average lower than the given value (inclusive). Min value: 0.0. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.ListRequest.PageToken
member.summary: The value of 'nextPageToken' from the previous page. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.ListRequest.RelationshipStatus
member.summary: Filters out all advertisers for which do not have the given relationship status with the requesting publisher.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.ListRequest.Role
member.summary: The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.AdvertisersResource.ListRequest.RoleId
member.summary: The ID of the requesting advertiser or publisher.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.CcOffersResource.List(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves credit card offers for the given publisher.
member.param: Required - The ID of the publisher in question.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.CcOffersResource.Projection
member.summary: The set of fields to return.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.CcOffersResource.Projection.Full
member.summary: Include all offer fields

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.CcOffersResource.Projection.Summary
member.summary: Include only the basic fields needed to display an offer. This is the default.

member.summary: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.List(Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.Role,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves event data for a given advertiser/publisher.
member.param: Required - Must be one of the following values [advertisers, publishers] - The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.
Required - The ID of the requesting advertiser or publisher.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ChargeType
member.summary: Filters out all charge events that are not of the given charge type. Valid values: 'other', 'slotting_fee', 'monthly_minimum', 'tier_bonus', 'credit', 'debit'. Optional.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ChargeType.Credit
member.summary: A credit increases the publisher's payout amount and decreases the advertiser's invoice amount.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ChargeType.Debit
member.summary: A debit reduces the publisher's payout and increases the advertiser's invoice amount.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ChargeType.Monthly_minimum
member.summary: A payment made to Google by an advertiser as a minimum monthly network fee.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ChargeType.Other
member.summary: Catch all. Default if unset

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ChargeType.Slotting_fee
member.summary: A one time payment made from an advertiser to a publisher.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ChargeType.Tier_bonus
member.summary: A payment from an advertiser to a publisher for the publisher maintaining a high tier level

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.Role
member.summary: The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.Role.Advertisers
member.summary: The requester is requesting as an advertiser.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.Role.Publishers
member.summary: The requester is requesting as a publisher.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.Status
member.summary: Filters out all events that do not have the given status. Valid values: 'active', 'canceled'. Optional.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.Status.Active
member.summary: Event is currently active.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.Status.Canceled
member.summary: Event is currently canceled.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.Type
member.summary: Filters out all events that are not of the given type. Valid values: 'action', 'transaction', 'charge'. Optional.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.Type.Action
member.summary: The completion of an application, sign-up, or other process. For example, an action occurs if a user clicks an ad for a credit card and completes an application for that card.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.Type.Charge
member.summary: A charge event is typically a payment between an advertiser, publisher or Google.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.Type.Transaction
member.summary: A conversion event, typically an e-commerce transaction. Some advertisers use a transaction to record other types of events, such as magazine subscriptions.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.Oauth_token
member.summary: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.QuotaUser
member.summary: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.AdvertiserId
member.summary: Caret(^) delimited list of advertiser IDs. Filters out all events that do not reference one of the given advertiser IDs. Only used when under publishers role. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.ChargeType
member.summary: Filters out all charge events that are not of the given charge type. Valid values: 'other', 'slotting_fee', 'monthly_minimum', 'tier_bonus', 'credit', 'debit'. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.EventDateMax
member.summary: Filters out all events later than given date. Optional. Defaults to 24 hours after eventMin.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.EventDateMin
member.summary: Filters out all events earlier than given date. Optional. Defaults to 24 hours from current date/time.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.LinkId
member.summary: Caret(^) delimited list of link IDs. Filters out all events that do not reference one of the given link IDs. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.MaxResults
member.summary: Max number of offers to return in this page. Optional. Defaults to 20.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.MemberId
member.summary: Caret(^) delimited list of member IDs. Filters out all events that do not reference one of the given member IDs. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.ModifyDateMax
member.summary: Filters out all events modified later than given date. Optional. Defaults to 24 hours after modifyDateMin, if modifyDateMin is explicitly set.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.ModifyDateMin
member.summary: Filters out all events modified earlier than given date. Optional. Defaults to 24 hours before the current modifyDateMax, if modifyDateMax is explicitly set.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.OrderId
member.summary: Caret(^) delimited list of order IDs. Filters out all events that do not reference one of the given order IDs. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.PageToken
member.summary: The value of 'nextPageToken' from the previous page. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.ProductCategory
member.summary: Caret(^) delimited list of product categories. Filters out all events that do not reference a product in one of the given product categories. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.PublisherId
member.summary: Caret(^) delimited list of publisher IDs. Filters out all events that do not reference one of the given publishers IDs. Only used when under advertiser role. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.Role
member.summary: The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.RoleId
member.summary: The ID of the requesting advertiser or publisher.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.Sku
member.summary: Caret(^) delimited list of SKUs. Filters out all events that do not reference one of the given SKU. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.Status
member.summary: Filters out all events that do not have the given status. Valid values: 'active', 'canceled'. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.EventsResource.ListRequest.Type
member.summary: Filters out all events that are not of the given type. Valid values: 'action', 'transaction', 'charge'. Optional.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.PublishersResource.Get(Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.PublishersResource.Role,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves data about a single advertiser if that the requesting advertiser/publisher has access to it. Only advertisers can look up publishers. Publishers can request information about themselves by omitting the publisherId query parameter.
member.param: Required - Must be one of the following values [advertisers, publishers] - The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.
Required - The ID of the requesting advertiser or publisher.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.PublishersResource.List(Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.PublishersResource.Role,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves data about all publishers that the requesting advertiser/publisher has access to.
member.param: Required - Must be one of the following values [advertisers, publishers] - The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.
Required - The ID of the requesting advertiser or publisher.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.PublishersResource.Role
member.summary: The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.PublishersResource.Role.Advertisers
member.summary: The requester is requesting as an advertiser.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.PublishersResource.Role.Publishers
member.summary: The requester is requesting as a publisher.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.PublishersResource.RelationshipStatus
member.summary: Filters out all publishers for which do not have the given relationship status with the requesting publisher.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.PublishersResource.RelationshipStatus.Approved
member.summary: Publishers you've approved to your program.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.PublishersResource.RelationshipStatus.Available
member.summary: Publishers available for you to recruit.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.PublishersResource.RelationshipStatus.Deactivated
member.summary: A publisher that you terminated from your program. Publishers also have the ability to remove themselves from your program.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.PublishersResource.RelationshipStatus.Declined
member.summary: A publisher that you did not approve to your program.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.PublishersResource.RelationshipStatus.Pending
member.summary: Publishers that have applied to your program. We recommend reviewing and deciding on pending publishers on a weekly basis.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.PublishersResource.ListRequest.MinNinetyDayEpc
member.summary: Filters out all publishers that have a ninety day EPC average lower than the given value (inclusive). Min value: 0.0. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.PublishersResource.ListRequest.MinPayoutRank
member.summary: A value between 1 and 4, where 1 represents the quartile of publishers with the lowest ranks and 4 represents the quartile of publishers with the highest ranks. Filters out all publishers with a lower rank than the given quartile. For example if a 2 was given only publishers with a payout rank of 25 or higher would be included. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.PublishersResource.ListRequest.MinSevenDayEpc
member.summary: Filters out all publishers that have a seven day EPC average lower than the given value (inclusive). Min value 0.0. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Gan.v1beta1.PublishersResource.ListRequest.PublisherCategory
member.summary: Caret(^) delimted list of publisher categories. Valid categories: (unclassified|community_and_content|shopping_and_promotion|loyalty_and_rewards|network|search_specialist|comparison_shopping|email). Filters out all publishers not in one of the given advertiser categories. Optional.
